item.title: The Book of Mormon—an Immeasurable Treasure on Our Journey
item.description:
The Book of Mormon—an Immeasurable Treasure on Our Journey by Elder Ozani Farias, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 195th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Oct 03 2025
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Ozani Farias, Of the Seventy
